reasoning: PTSD prevalence reported as chronic mental health condition, not incidence. Global prevalence ~3.5% from epidemiological surveys and WHO data, though varies significantly by region and conflict exposure.
source: Kessler RC et al. (2005). Lifetime prevalence and age-of-onset distributions of DSM-IV disorders in the National Comorbidity Survey Replication. Arch Gen Psychiatry. 62(6):593-602
